subject1.description: A great overview of HTTP request methods like GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE.
Official Express.js documentation on how to set up routes for your application.

subject2.description: Learn how to configure Knex.js to connect to your PostgreSQL database.

subject3.description: An excellent introduction to JSON Web Tokens (JWT) and how they work.
Documentation for the bcrypt library, essential for hashing passwords securely.
